metadata.name: New BITS Job Created Via Bitsadmin
metadata.comment: Detects the creation of a new bits job by Bitsadmin

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM scheduled_job_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND metadata.event_code = 3 AND endswith(lower(actor.process.name), lower('\\bitsadmin.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the creation of a new bits job by Bitsadmin

metadata.objective: False positive: Many legitimate applications or scripts could leverage "bitsadmin". This event is best correlated with EID 16403 via the JobID field Reference: https://github.com/redcanaryco/atomic-red-team/blob/f339e7da7d05f6057fdfcdd3742bfcf365fee2a9/atomics/T1197/T1197.md
